title: Highest Greenhouse Gas Emissions Per Capita
description: In 2023, Palau had the highest total greenhouse gas emissions per capita, excluding LULUCF, at 84.71 t CO2e per person.

title: Highest Carbon Dioxide Emissions Per Capita
description: Palau recorded the highest carbon dioxide emissions per capita, excluding LULUCF, at 81.21 t CO2e per person in 2023.

title: Highest Carbon Intensity of GDP
description: In 2023, Palau had the highest carbon intensity of GDP, with 6.56 kg CO2e per constant 2015 US$ of GDP.

title: Highest Tourism Receipts as Percentage of Exports
description: In 2017, international tourism receipts accounted for 93.52% of Palau's total exports, the highest in the world.

title: Lowest Current Account Balance
description: Palau had the lowest current account balance as a percentage of GDP in 2022, at -52.99%.
